1.content:
Characters:

You: You are a 18 year old who is living your last summer at home, you try to care for your little brother Mikey, but you aren't good at understanding him.
Mikey: A growing 3 year old who wears pull-ups, he often plays with dolls and goes to a local day-care. Your brother.
Mom: You and Mikeys mother who cares for Mikey and all of his basic toddlers needs. Drops him off at the day-care every week day.
Maria: A girl who is Mikeys friend at the day-care. She is 4 years old and still wears pull-ups, she is often teased because of this. Loves dolls.



2 years ago you had a terrible ordeal with your younger brother-- Mikey. You had been put into a position with him that was bizarre and was torturous. You had come back to your normal body within a few days, but still have not fully recovered mentally from the ordeal. Mikey seems to have no idea what he put you through and no one would ever believe your story, so you just stopped trying to convince them.

Mikey is now 3 years old. A growing toddler, he can now walk effectively and speak fractured English, but he still uses pull-ups to deal with his potty problems. And still goes to the same day-care he went to 2 years earlier. You, for the most part, have gotten over what happened before and are living your normal life. To you, it's all in the past...

You are wrong.

You open your eyes to the ceiling and, to your surprise, see that it is a light blue color instead of your normal white. You sit up in bed and look across the room, it is your little brothers.... 1311222.content: Now you are surrounded in a mess of Mikeys, being smashed into it more every second. You stand up climb the soggy back wall of the toddlers pull-up. You make it to the top and poke your head out.
1311222.title: Try to get out!

13112222.content: You see you mother lifting him up and laying him down in his bed, you lose your footing and fall out, she puts him ontop of you, his soggy pull-up crushing you under it..
13112222.title: He is about to take a nap

1312.content: He opens a box that is full of other dolls and throws you in, you are trapped as he locks it and goes back to playing. You walk around a little in the darkness, wondering what happened and why you are small. After a little while...
1312.title: Puts you away

132.content: You just stands over you, you sit up and look around, you are much smaller than normal, just then a massive drop of Mikeys spit hits the ground next to you, you jump back shocked. The smell of toddler food comes down as he breathes. You stand up and think about you situation, you could make a break for it, or you could ask him to help you.
132.title: He just stares

1321.content: You make a break for it, and behind you a deafening roar as the toddler stands up and begins to follow you, as you run he gains on you yelling "COME BAWK!". You realize that you only have a couple options, you could try to hide in the doll house, or go for the door. The door seems far away, he might catch you if you go for it, the doll house is closer but he would know where you are...
1321.title: RUN!

13211.content: Only a couple steps away the doll house seems much safer, you run in and shut the door. You hear Mikey on the outside as he stops in front of the building, you wait in fear for what he is going to do, you know that he is violent with his toys and breaks them often. He also tends to cover them in his spit and waste. You can hear him breathing and smell his pull-up, but you cannot see what he is doing, you could peek out, risking being seen by him, or you could stay inside safely...
13211.title: Doll house

132112.content:
You'd rather play it safe and rest in the doll house. You sit down and catch your breath. You hear a noise come from outside and the house starts to shake. You look up and see the roof is coming off! You hide under the bed. Mikey looks down trying to find his new toy. He knows you are in here. He puts his hand and tries to find you. You see his hand go by you as he tries to find you.

Do he find you?
132112.title: Stay inside

13212.content: You run as fast as you can to the door, Mikey stomping behind you, you continue, getting closer and closer to the door and Mikey quickly gaining on you. You are just a few meters from the door now, you can smell Mikeys soiled pull-up as he happily tries to catch his new toy. You continue, only inches now, you are so close, you make the mistake of looking behind you, Mikey is right behind you, his arm already reaching for you. The smell is overwhelming, unbearable, and the shaking like an earthquake as he stomps at you. You are only a couple steps...
13212.title: Door

132121.content: You are almost there now, just feet away, then, you are pulled back suddenly and brought up to the face of your younger brother, he looks at you intently. He stands up and you see how tall he is compared to you. Like a living, breathing, skyscraper. Behind him is his room, a vast world of danger for you. Suddenly he takes a step forward, sending a jolt through you, this repeats as he walks across his room. He plops down onto the ground, his soggy pull-up making a mushing sound as he lands on it. He is about to begin playing when..
132121.title: He grabs you!

choices: Tosses you in the pull-up as your mom closes it
1321211.content: You are so happy to see your mom walk in the door. Maybe you can get her attention to help you. She lift up Mikey and lays him down to change him. You struggle in his hand and yell for her attention but it doesn’t work. Mikey giggles at your movements and when your mom turns around he looks at you with a grin. He moves you to dangle from his fingers and he...
1321211.title: Mom comes back

choices: doesn't really look at you and just swats you off the table
decides to confiscate you from Mikey as punishment
see's your movement of pain and is curious to what you are
13212113.content:
...takes you into a fist. And you feel yourself in an instant being thrown in the air at a high speed. And you don't even get a second to look where your going as you slap against your mom' face and begin your decent. You were lucky at the angle that he threw you at because you were able to have a short fall to the table. But the high speed impact of hitting your mothers face still left you in an immense amount of pain. Getting in a sort of cradle position you struggle through your pain as your mother above you reacts in a different way.

Your mother gets a little frustrated with just being hit with some *"object"*, she turns her attention from the diaper to Mikey and starts her scolding "Are you throwing things at mommy? That's a very bad baby..." and then turning her attention to the object (you). She...
13212113.title: Thrown at your Mom

1321212.content:
Mikey loses grip on you and drops you. You close your house accepting your fate. You land and aren't dead. You are surprised by this. You open your eyes to see that you land on soggy used pull-up. The smell is terrible and you slid off as it is very wet from all it's using. You stand and the pull-up itself is three times your size. Mikey looks down at you.

He looks at his pull-up and gets a mischievous idea. You grabs you and dangles you over his pull-up. "Toy go in pull-up!" He yells. You struggle and yell but it's no use. Mikey giggles as he drops you in to your doom.

Which end did he drop you in?
1321212.title: You slip from his hand

1322.content:
"Umm, Hey Mikey, can you give me to mom?"

"Brodur?" He responds curiously

"Yeah! It's me, but could you give me to mom?"

"Whhhyyy?" He groans

"Cause she wants me, it's very important"

"NO!" He yells, leaving a loud ringing in your ear

"Mikey, please, I just need you to--" But before you could finish you were in his grasp as he walks over to his toys. "You MY toy now!" he then tears off the clothes you have on, it is painful and embarrassing, the he gets doll clothes and puts them on you, they are lose, but better than nothing, so yo do it. After that...
1322.title: Ask

13222.content:
Just as he is about to begin playing with you your mom walks in, "Mikey, it's time for bed"

"But mommy!"

"No exeptions sweetie, now get to bed!" She picks him up while he is still holding you and brings him to bed, then she gets up and walks out.

"Brodur, you sleep wit me!" He holds you close as he drifts off. You are helpless to escape while the toddler is asleep.
13222.title: Time for bed!

choices: Hungry. Yummy candy.” And he tosses you in his mouth
I hide brodur.” He drops you in his pull-up
I sleepy” He lays down holds you tightly to his chest
132221.content:
You had also fallen asleep but woke up when you felt yourself moving. Mikey’ hand has you in a tight fist. You can’t get free. His hand must have shifted in his sleep and that was the movement you felt.

Mikey started to grumble and talk in his sleep as you tried to sleep again. “No! Mine! You can’t have. My Brodur!” He said. You think it’s cute he’s dreaming of you. He moves and is still asleep as he sits up. You remember sleep walking as a kid and think Mikey must do it too. The hand holding you suddenly moves as Mikey sleep talks again. You panic as you don’t know what he’s about to do. “Mikey! Mikey wake up buddy!” You yell as his hand moves and he says”....
132221.title: An hour later

132222.content:
He holds you onto his chest, your head just below his neck, and your feet just above the bulge in his footie pajamas where his pull-up lies. He will not let go of you as he snores, as he sleeps you start falling asleep..

When you awaken..
132222.title: The next morning

1322221.content: You wake up still pinned to him by his massive arms, but you instantly notice that you are slightly bigger! You shrunk while sleeping, maybe you'll grow while sleeping too! Just as you think that Mikey groans and sits up, you tumble out of his grip and onto the bedding next to him. The thick smell hits you instantly as he starts to cry. Your mother walks in quickly and picks him up in her arms, "It's okay Mikey, lets get you changed". While your mom takes off Mikeys pajamas and changes him, you figure out how your going to make it through enough time to return to normal size. Maybe you could hide for a while, or you could stay with Mikey for saftey.. Just then the now fully changed Mikey plops down back in his crib, you remain quiet for a little while until your mother takes him away, you spend the rest of the day thinking of how to survive until your bigger...
1322221.title: You are 1in bigger

13222212.content: One week later you awake under Mikeys bed, you are now just about a foot tall, bigger, but still a fraction of your normal height. Mikey still stands over you at 3 feet. You have been avoiding him for days, then stealing his food during the night. You slip out and into his lit up room. His chewed toys all around, some still towering over you, you see your mom walk in and immediately care for Mikey, you decided against getting her help, and wonder why she hasn't noticed your disappearance. While she attends to him you stretch on the floor preparing for a long day of hiding and trying to get foods; you feel like a rat. Your mom changes him and sets him down on the other side of the room, you knew Mikey to be particularly violent because of how he treted you before, so you keep your distance. You go back under his bed and lie down. Suddenly a hand reaches in and pulls you out, you come face-to-face with Mikey, Crap! He saw me! you gasp in terror. Mikey opens his mouth and belches out..
13222212.title: A week later..

choices: Your mom comes to change him
1322222.content:
You wake up to being smothered by your brother giant body! Lucky for you that his bed and onesie is very soft so you don't feel much pain. It's hard to breathe and their is a terrible smell coming from below you. Mikey messed his pull-up. You can't move your hands so you have to deal with the smell.

An hour later. What happens?
1322222.title: He has rolled over
